it.polimi.se2018.network.server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.network.server.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventPreGameVisitor, ServerVisitor, ServerController, TimerCallback

    public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServerController, TimerCallback, ServerVisitor, EventPreGameVisitor
    Class based on the Abstract Factory Design Pattern. This class define the server side of the game. This class implements ServerController to have basic methods for RMI and Socket Server.
    Author:
    DavideMammarella

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Starter for the server. This method start the server and put it listen on the RMI port.
        Parameters:
        args - parameters used for the connection.

      • startServer

        public void startServer(int rmiPort,
                        int socketPort)
        Put the server on listen. The server will connect only with the technology selected from client (RMI or Socket).
        Parameters:
        rmiPort - port used on RMI connection.
